title: East-West Line disruption due to track point fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东西线因道岔故障而中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan di Laluan Timur-Barat akibat kerosakan noktah trek
title_translations.ta: டிராக்கு பாயிங் பாதிக்கப்பட்டு கிழக்கு-மேற்கு கோடான்கக குழாய்க்கு இடையூறு

updates.text: 9.30am: EWL - Due to a track point fault, please add additional 25 minutes train travel time from Boon Lay to Buona Vista stations towards Pasir Ris station. Free regular and bridging bus services from Boon Lay to Buona Vista stations. Passengers on the North South Line towards city area, please transfer to Thomson East Coast Line at Woodlands station or take counter bound trains towards Marina South Pier station.
